name: Abhishek

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description:
I have almost 10 years of experience in software development.
The clients I worked : ING, CyberSoek Amsterdam, Dell, Xerox, JP Morgan & Chase, Otsuka Pharmaceutical, Delta Airlines 
Gained project based experience in React, Web-Components, ES6,Typescript, Angular Node js, Accessibility, AzureDevOps, lit-html

services.title: Product Design
services.description: I am keen on designing and developing products that are user-friendly and accessible. I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people.

resume.tagline: I'm a software engineer, product designer.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of the new application, Implemented a admin dashboard and a lottery mechanism front end, Tech stack used here is React, Redux and Mantine

education.universityPara: I hold a four year  Bachelors degree in Electronics & Communication Engineering.
